summary: Technology, demographics, and attitudes toward work are evolving. But federal government employment policies were designed generations ago. As a result, the government may struggle to compete for talented workers—which is one reason why federal human capital management is on our High Risk list. title: Federal Workforce: Talent Management Strategies to Help Agencies Better Compete in a Tight Labor Market
